title: Startup Culture
description: Learn about the culture of startups and how they operate.

quiz.question: What is the primary role of a Product Manager in a startup?
options: B) Oversee product development from ideation to launch
C) Promote technology solutions to customers
quiz._answer: B) Oversee product development from ideation to launch

quiz.question: What do Growth Hackers focus on to drive rapid growth in startups?

quiz.question: Which role is responsible for advocating technology solutions and engaging with the technology community?
